text:
Bibi Ferreira (born Abigail Izquierdo Ferreira; 1 June 1922 – 13 February 2019) was a Brazilian actress. In 1962, she tested for a part in the Brazilian production of "My Fair Lady". She then received leads in "Hello Dolly" and "Man of La Mancha".
In 2016, she appeared in New York City in “Bibi Times Four.”
Feffeira died on 13 February 2019 at her apartment in Rio de Janeiro from heart failure at the age of 96.
